title: Real-Time Feedback-Based Communication System Behavior Coding Training

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic communication strategies and understanding of behavioral observation
context.additional_context: Learners who aim to strengthen effective communication skills with team members as managers and can perform real-time behavioral coding training in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply accurate behavioral coding criteria for communication procedure phases at 90% or higher accuracy
Learners achieve three consecutive error-free coding performances after error correction through real-time feedback
Learners maintain 80% or higher procedural integrity in evaluations conducted four weeks post-training completion
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
